Mandatory Hello World!

Hello again internet – it has been far too long

While my time blogging over on the official Telerik blogs has been great, blogging about the UI components we offer on ASP.NET Ajax and ASP.NET MVC, it has been far over–due for me to set up my own personal blog to clog the interwebs’ tubes.

For right now, WordPress with one of the default themes will have to do, but this will of course change over time

So, get excited and get ready – content is a–coming
